2f000a99-9295-4fe2-a62d-4d46834565d4: {n}Sosiel turns to you. His teeth are clenched, his hands shaking.{/n} "I don't want to believe that Trever became a Hellknight... Please, we need to go there and find out for ourselves!"
7ade661b-88f8-4908-928b-21e27712f7e9: {n}Sosiel turns to you.{/n} "Let me introduce you, Trever. This is Commander {name}, my trusted leader and my close friend. I never would have found you without {mf|his|her} help!"

17514a21-d50d-4fe7-9f53-bfe92fb1cddd: {n}Sosiel's hands are trembling. He looks through the helmet's slit, right into the eyes of the man who once bore the name of Trever Vaenic — then cuts his brother's throat in a single motion.{/n}
1bcfc5b4-dfa3-4db7-b3b7-c4adcde4457a: {n}Sosiel's whisper is barely audible.{/n} "Good riddance, scum."
8bece810-35a6-41d7-9b50-d17fe8dd10c1: {n}The blood drains from Sosiel's face. His fingers unclench, and he recoils away from the bars.{/n}
668485e6-4d4c-415f-a184-d3f743c80c6a: {n}The cleric looks up at the sky.{/n} "Forgive me, Eternal Rose. You teach us to be merciful to our enemies and love them, but I... I am too weak, I'm afraid. Grant me absolution from this sin, for this kind of love is beyond me."
613bd602-2cb1-4800-a795-19328f880fc0: {n}The cleric shakes his head stubbornly.{/n} "No. I am weak and sinful, but not to this extent. How would I dare touch the holy symbol of Shelyn again after killing him like this?"
f886d814-fb04-4f4d-b7bf-f880bb2ecdb2: {n}The cleric watches them leave.{/n} "It seems I knew very little about my brother... And about myself." {n}He looks at you sadly.{/n}

0533c531-b0ed-4c86-929c-8ef95599c8e2: {n}The crowd enters a frenzy, but Sosiel doesn't hear them. He leaves the arena silently, without looking at anyone.{/n}
da4d7490-1028-423f-b5fc-0f7457308b90: {n}The dead woman covers her face with what remains of her decaying hands.{/n} "So, I died, but even in death the accursed servants of the Abyss torment me? 0619fc2f-9004-4937-8fe0-67797b94d713: {n}The gladiator's weapon hits the shield with a sonorous clang that sounds like a lament. He raises his blade again, but suddenly freezes. After several seconds of examining the shield, his eyes slowly track up to the face of the man holding it.{/n}
a9ed6844-9c93-4079-b619-22f2a4af6f32: {n}The gnome shrugs nonchalantly.{/n} "Strictly speaking, these two are the property of the Order of the Nail... But I see they are useless rubbish. 8165279a-e4c6-4474-bff9-4d6b5b4982cf: {n}The half-elf spits.{/n} "It's true. If we hadn't lost our nerve back then..."
2a7afbd9-d29f-44b0-994b-d112b4a507b6: {n}The half-rotten corpse of a woman shambles out of the crypt. She leers at you with her empty eye sockets and croaks out a few words:{/n} "Thank the gods and thank you, too! I knew this was going to happen someday. They buried me alive!"
8d4c53ad-ec22-46c6-96e8-eaebdfded33b: {n}The helmet prevents the gladiator from hearing anything not already drowned out by the crowd. The warrior breaks into a sprint and lunges at Sosiel with his sword raised to strike.{/n}
8b912438-7cba-4503-9104-9f9a3bbbe54f: {n}The impostor enjoys the look on Sosiel's face.{/n} "Keep listening. Don't interrupt me. We were hunting a chimera back then. 78bb1036-3bd8-40d8-ab24-ca7072e2f73d: {n}The impostor guffaws.{/n} "Hahaha, true enough... Commander, you crack me up."
2a88b8a9-83c9-4ba6-8eaa-b17440c00cf4: {n}The impostor is staring at the cracks in the ceiling.{/n} "You again. What else do you need?"
8200e6d6-56c5-4f10-a3e8-949677042f0b: {n}The knight salutes.{/n} "Greetings on behalf of the order! Forgive me, I can't stay, duty calls. I have a pressing errand. From headquarters, yes. It's very urgent."
3093d624-8c8d-496d-961c-b765cd91c0dc: {n}The man in the helmet knocks Sosiel down with a brutal strike. He hovers over the cleric, raising his weapon for a killing blow, but suddenly freezes motionless and looks his victim in the eye.{/n}
70a21dea-e802-4067-a614-5b5f2fdda6db: {n}The man's eyes dart around as if he's looking for an escape route, then he regains his composure and stands his ground,{/n} "People usually visit a healer when they start seeing auras around things. I truly am Trever Vaenic, real and in the flesh!"
55908f7c-e465-41aa-ae01-6e782f196139: {n}The monster is dead. Wiping the sweat from his face, Sosiel looks over the battlefield.{/n} "It's the Extirpators. This enemy must have been more than they could manage." {n}The cleric folds his hands in a short funeral prayer.{/n}
619460ed-9e77-4d1d-a99f-929f9d00afe4: {n}The priest shakes his head.{/n} "It's like a bad dream or an evil fey joke... Please, help me make sense of this, before I lose my mind."
d5c71322-a766-4703-8065-ba20bdd36abb: {n}The prisoner spits on the floor.{/n} "Of course. I expected nothing less. So long, Commander, see you in the Abyss!"
c03a00a5-804c-420d-b0dd-e93b9f7a2fa1: {n}The townsfolk are clearly terrified of even looking at the fallen undead, but Sosiel's soft words reassure them. As they work together, the graveyard soon regains its tranquil appearance.{/n}
87570113-5c70-47d5-a03e-d241aa354bda: {n}The very sound of this name makes the former gladiator flinch as if from a blow. He shakes his head emphatically.{/n} "No, enough! Forget that mindless dog's name forever. My name is Trever Vaenic!"
d6ab73c5-8041-496f-8e80-0743c17a520e: {n}The young cleric places his palms on top of his brother's huge calloused fists clutching the blade's hilt. d935fdcb-bfb2-437f-85dd-3cca8f909a21: {n}Trever answers instantly, without hesitation:{/n} "I want to go home."
647c4aba-567b-4ebd-978f-b44e37b3d4d3: {n}Trever doesn't seem to recognize you at first, but then he nods.{/n} "Commander."
5fa27126-334c-4790-817f-776b952f318a: {n}Trever eyes the ring of demons closing in around them and emits a low, beastlike roar. He picks his blade back up and stands between Sosiel and the enemy.{/n}
d87ca41c-4c2f-4800-a19c-bf576424a55f: {n}Trever looks through you and speaks in an unusually small voice.{/n} "It's like a vague dream. 54dcda89-9738-442f-99b3-e995765b6302: {n}Trever picks his blade up from the ground and points it at the arena guards circling the two brothers. This simple gesture has a truly intimidating effect on the demons.{/n} "Leave, brother. I will stay here and hold them off... until the end. Like a hero."

e77f999e-29b7-4e71-9e5f-c6e920ecc048: {n}With a heavy heart, Sosiel looks at the corpses of his friends, returned to rest by his own hand.{/n} "What is this twisted mockery? Who could possibly — wait, what's this?" {n}He bends down and recovers something from the ground.{/n}
2cc26587-ef40-400a-a556-dd1e17b04de3: {n}You've never seen Sosiel like this. The usually calm, friendly cleric of the goddess of beauty is furious. He is shaking the impostor, holding him by the collar with both hands.{/n} "Who are you? What do you know about my brother? Speak! Speak, you scum!"
